underweight.recommendation: Consult with a healthcare professional or a nutritionist to create a balanced diet plan that includes a variety of nutrient-dense foods. Incorporate lean proteins, healthy fats, whole grains, fruits, and vegetables into your meals. Regular exercise, including strength training, can also help build muscle mass.

overweight.recommendation: Aim for a gradual and sustainable weight loss by adopting a healthy diet and increasing physical activity. Focus on portion control, choose nutrient-dense foods, and engage in regular aerobic exercise and strength training.

obese.recommendation: Seek guidance from a healthcare professional or a registered dietitian to develop a personalized weight loss plan. This may include a combination of dietary changes, increased physical activity, and behavior modification.
